property.name: Text
property.value: Private. While the Accountant is in play, all Events have a Ghost Rock cost of 2. If the Event's owner does not pay this Ghost Rock cost, the Event is Aced without effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Pay 1 Ghost Rock immediately after Adrian becomes Wanted. Adrian Townsend becomes un-Wanted.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Lost Angels

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: If your posse contains one of your Blessed dudes, Alastor moves to the shootout's location (if necessary) and joins the posse.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mystical. Weapon. Reaction: After another player's Event resolves, the Anahuac Staff gains a permanent +1 Bullet bonus.

property.name: Text
property.value: Harrowed. Army of the Dead may not be targeted by Harrowed Ability cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Government. Dudes in the Art Gallery have their Upkeep cost reduced by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Boot Astoreth when you bring an Abomination into play from your Play hand. The Ghost Rock cost of the Abomination is reduced by Astoreth's Influence. Reaction: Boot Astoreth at the beginning of the Upkeep phase and target one of your Abominations. The Upkeep cost of the Abomination is reduced by Astoreth's Influence.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman. Noon Spirit 7: If this Spirit succeeds, players may only discard one card during Nightfall this turn (events are not automatically discarded).

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster. Noon Hex 8: Target the highest value Dude controlled by another player. If this Hex succeeds, Ace this Hex, and the target Dude is cursed: the next player to ace the Dude with an action or in a shootout gains 1 Victory Point.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Texas Rangers

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist:2. Experienced. Reaction: Boot Barthalomew immediately before the Nightfall phase. You may perform one additional Noon action. You may not use this action to put a Deed into play.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Sioux Union

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Noon: Move Billy from one out-of-town Deed to another. Noon: Move Billy from one out-of-town Deed to another.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Strike. At the end of Nightfall, boot all Dudes at the Bleeding Vein.

property.name: Text
property.value: This Dude is Wanted while Blood Money is attached.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Texas Rangers

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Pull: Boot Patterson and pay 5 Ghost Rock to target one of your dudes in Boot Hill that was previously in play. If the pull is less than the dude's value, return the dude to your Home, booted. The Dude gains the harrowed trait, permanently.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster. Noon Hex 8: Target this or an adjacent location and declare a difficulty for the Hex. If the Hex succeeds, Dudes may not move to the target location until after Nightfall unless the Dude's controller discards a card from his or her Play hand with a value higher than the difficulty.

property.name: Text
property.value: Until after Nightfall, any Dude calling out another Dude must boot to do so.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: Abomination. Chupacabra's value cannot be changed except with the ability below. Reaction: When another player's Dude goes to Boot Hill from this location, increase Chupacabra's value by 1, permanently (maximum King). This can be used once per Dude Aced at this location. Noon: Target a Dude at this location. If the Fear level and Chupacabra's value are both greater than the Dude's value, ace the Dude.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Target one of your Dudes when he or she is Aced outside of a shootout. The Dude is not aced, but goes home booted instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. Government. While the Confederate Barracks' controller puts a Dude into play from his or her Play hand, reduce the Ghost Rock cost of the Dude by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play when a card effect is preventing you from targeting a Dude. You may target that Dude.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may bring Dudes into play at this Deed. When a card or game effect sends one of your Dudes home, you may move them to this Deed instead.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Agency

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Dudes with a lower Bullet rating than Cort may not call out any of your other Dudes at this or an adjacent location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist:0. Noon: Boot Cynthia Kingston to target a skilled Dude at this location. The Dude may not use any skills until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster. Noon Hex 8: If this Hex succeeds, this Huckster gains a +5 Influence bonus until after Nightfall. Ace this Dude after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Boot one of your Dudes and target one of your Deeds. The Deed gains a permanent +1 Control Point bonus. Any other player may cancel this action as it is played by booting a Dude with Influence greater than that of your Dude. Each player may only play one copy of this card per turn. A Deed cannot gain this bonus more than once per game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target a Dude with a value less than 9 at an out-of-town Deed. That Dude's Influence is reduced to 0 until after Nightfall.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Agency

property.name: Text
property.value: Delilah Darby-Scorne's Influence is reduced to 0 while she is booted. Reaction: Immediately before another Dude moves from this location, boot Delilah Darby-Scorne to interrogate the Dude. The target Dude may not move out of this location until after Nightfall. If the Dude was in a shootout, the Dude remains at this location but is out of the shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: May only be attached to a Public Deed. This Deed is Private.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Callouts from Deputy Dave may not be refused unless he is Wanted. Reaction: After a shootout ends in which Dave participated and an opposing Dude was Aced, Dave gains a permanent +1 Influence bonus.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. Dudes in this location do not have to boot to join posses in adjacent locations.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play immediately before another player pulls for a card effect. That player pulls an additional card, and you choose which card is used for the pull. Only one Down the Barrel... can be played per pull.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster. Noon Hex 6: Target a Spell in this location. If this Hex succeeds, discard the Spell.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Immediately after Dustin Halloway enters play, he joins your outfit until he leaves play.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Lost Angels

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed:0. Enrique Alonso's Bullet rating is equal to his Blessed skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist:3. Experienced-2. Reaction: Pay 1 Ghost Rock immediately before Zarkov attempts to create a Gadget Weapon. If successful, the Weapon gains a permanent +1 Bullet bonus. Reaction: Pay 2 Ghost Rock immediately before Zarkov attempts to create a Gadget Weapon. If successful, while the Weapon is attached to a Dude, that Dude is a Stud.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Texas Rangers

property.name: Text
property.value: Harrowed. Shootout: Move one of your other Texas Rangers to this location. The Ranger joins this posse.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. The Fine China Shop is discarded immediately after any shootout ends at this location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play immediately before posses are formed. Target one location adjacent to the location of the shootout. Dudes at that location may not join a posse.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Play when there are no Dudes in the opposing posse with a ready Weapon. Target a Dude in your posse without a ready Weapon. The Dude gains +2 Bullet bonus until the end of the Shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Abomination. Noon: Move Flesh Mob to the Town Square.

property.name: Text
property.value: This Dude gains an additional +1 Influence bonus during Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Founder's Memorial may only be attached to an in-town Deed. The controller of this Deed has a +2 Influence bonus for their total during Nightfall.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Maze Rats

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. You may not attach a Weapon to Freddy from your Play hand or from another one of your Dudes. Shootout: Target a Weapon in the opposing posse. Attach the Weapon to Freddy. The Weapon is discarded (to its owner's discard pile) when the shootout ends.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Maze Rats

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-Unique. Maze Rat players may have any number of Gandy Dancers in play. Card memory does not apply to Gandy Dancers.

property.name: Text
property.value: All dude with spells attached must discard all but one of their spells.

property.name: Text
property.value: Gatling Emplacement may be attached to your home. Controller Shootout: Target one of your Dudes in a shootout at this location. Boot the Dude to give him or her a +3 Bullet bonus until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Boot one of your Deeds with a value less than 4 to gain 1 Victory Point. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mystical. When the Gris-Gris enters play, target a Dude who becomes linked to the Gris-Gris. Noon: Give the linked Dude either a -1 Bullet penalty or a -1 Influence penalty, until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Select a Wanted Dude in play and target an un-Wanted Dude in the same location who is controlled by the same player. The target Dude becomes Wanted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Move this Dude to an adjacent location that you own.

property.name: Text
property.value: Abomination. Immediately before the Noon phase, pull. The Dude (other than the Judge) with the value closest to the pull (you choose if there is a tie) is chased by the Judge. That Dude becomes Wanted. If the Dude is already Wanted, the Judge boots, moves to the Dude's location, and Aces the Dude.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman. Noon Spirit 5: Target a Dude with a lower Influence than this Shaman. If this Spirit succeeds, the Dude gains a +2 Influence bonus until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dudes Aced in a shootout at this Deed make a pull as if they were Harrowed. If the Dude remains in play due to the pull, he or she gains the Harrowed trait, permanently.

property.name: Text
property.value: Until after Nightfall, all Action cards have a +1 Ghost Rock cost (including actions with a Ghost Rock cost of 0).

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman. Noon Spirit 6: Target a Spell in this or an adjacent location. If this Spirit succeeds, discard the Spell.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target a skilled Dude. The Dude gains a +2 bonus to one of his or her skills until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Out of Town. Controller Reaction: When you bring a Dude into play, you may immediately attach a non-Gadget horse from your Play hand to that Dude, paying all costs as normal.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Target one of your Dudes in this posse. Other Dudes in the same posse with a lower Bullet rating may not be targeted with actions while the target Dude remains in the posse.

property.name: Text
property.value: In-Door Plumbing may only be attached to an in-town Deed. Dudes moving to this Deed for the first time during a turn do not have to boot.

property.value: Mad Scientist. Gadget Difficulty: 4. Noon: Pay 6 Ghost Rock to gain 9 Ghost Rock.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Until the end of the shootout, Isaiah becomes a Stud but has a -2 Bullet penalty (minimum 0).

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Mad Scientists in this location have a +1 bonus to their Mad Scientist Skill.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. The Jeweller's controller has additional total Influence during Nightfall equal to the number of Dudes he or she controls with a value greater than 9.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Target a Spell attached to a Dude in the opposing posse. The Spell is discarded and Jonah Wheeler is a Stud until the end of the shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Juliet gains a +1 Bullet bonus, a +1 Influence bonus, and is a Stud while at the same location as Rachel Sumner.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Until the end of the turn, Abominations and Hucksters are considered Wanted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play before Shootout actions begin for a shootout in which you have one or more Dudes. You may immediately perform one Shootout action before Shootout actions begin. Only one Last Meal can be played per shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Pull: If the pull is greater than the current Fear level, lower the Fear level by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Strike. Immediately after an Event resolves, all Dudes at the Leaning Rock Strike go home, booted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target a Dude. The Dude gains +1 influence until after Nightfall.

property.value: The Agency

property.name: Text
property.value: Lord Ripley Scorne is a Stud when he has a Derringer ready.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another player reveals an illegal Draw hand. Raise or lower the Fear Level by 2. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a player per draw.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster:X. Experienced. Abomination. Lucifer's Huckster rating is equal to the number of Hucksters you control in play.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Sioux Union

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman:1. Mad Wolf Striding may only attach a number of Spirits up to twice his Shaman skill. Reaction: When you attach a Spirit to Mad Wolf Striding, you may Draw a card from your deck.

property.value: Mad Scientist:0.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced-2. All other Sweetrock Dudes gain a +1 Bullet bonus, a +1 Influence bonus, and increase their value by 4 (maximum King), while at Max's location.

property.value: Lost Angels

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed:0. Reaction: Immediately before Nightfall, target another player's Dude at this location. Megan Mallory calls out the Dude. Dudes in adjacent locations may not boot to join either posse.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster:2. Experienced. Abomination. Vampire. Reaction: Immediately after another Dude has performed a spell, target the Dude. The Dude becomes wanted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target one of your booted Dudes and boot one of your other Dudes. Move both Dudes to your home (if not already there).

property.name: Text
property.value: Actions on Deeds in play may not be performed this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Target another player's Action card that has just resolved. No further copies of that Action card may be played by any player for the rest of the game. Reduce your maximum hand size by 1 permanently. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Boot Nadia when you reshuffle your discard pile to restock your deck. Nadia Krasnova gains a +1 Bullet bonus and a +1 Influence bonus, permanently. You may perform this actiion up to 3 times per game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Boot Natalie Sherman to target another player immediately before the Upkeep phase. You may reduce that player's outfit production by 1 or increase your outfit's production by 1, until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. Casino. Terrors in the New Dunwitch Casino gain a +1 Influence bonus during Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Until after Nightfall, Aces are played high, ranking above a king (with a numerical value of 14).

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. Controller Noon: Boot all Dudes at this location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Controller Reaction: Get one non-Gadget horse from your discard pile and put it in your Play hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play immediately before a player wins the game. If that player has no Dudes in play, the player does not win this turn, and play continues as normal. Until the end of the game, that player is always considered to have two fewer Control Points towards victory (cumulative).

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play after one of your Dudes is Aced or discarded by an Event. Target one Dude controlled by the Event's owner. Ace that Dude.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed. Noon Miracle 8: Target a Dude in this or an adjacent location. If this Miracle succeeds, the Blessed calls that Dude out, who may not refuse. The shootout occurs at the target's location. All Terrors in the shootout have a Bullet rating of 0 and are Draws.

property.name: Text
property.value: Horse. Noon: Move this Dude from one in-town location to another.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Personal Safe enters play booted. Noon: Boot and Ace the Personal Safe to gain 4 Ghost Rock.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target an action printed on a card in play. That action may be used an additional time this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Gain 2 Ghost Rock. This Dude is Wanted. Noon: Pay 1 Ghost Rock to give this Dude a +1 Influence bonus until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed. Noon Miracle 6: Target a player's deck. If this Hex succeeds, look at the top four cards of that deck, then return them in the same order.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target a Deed in town. Until Nightfall, unbooted Dudes in town may move to that Deed once as a Noon action. This does not boot the Dude. Only one Publicity Stunt may be played per turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Boot one of your in-town Agency, Law Dog or Ranger Dudes to target a Wanted Dude in town with an equal or lower value. Boot the target Dude.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Attach a Weapon from your Play hand to this Dude, ignoring all costs and requirements to enter play. Discard the Weapon when the shootout ends.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Quon Lin gains a +1 Bullet bonus for each ready Weapon in the opposing posse.

property.value: Rats in the Walls can only be attached to your home. Harrowed Dudes Aced in this location do not perform a Harrowed pull.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target the highest value Dude in play (you choose if there is a tie). If that Dude is Aced this turn, the Dude is not aced, but is discarded instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play immediately before a Deed enters play, before its cost is paid. The Deed's owner must boot a Dude, or the Deed is discarded.

property.name: Text
property.value: Rex is a Stud while he is in the Town Square.

property.value: Noon: Boot Rhett Caufield while he is at a location in another player's street to take 1 Ghost Rock from that player.

property.value: Public. Out of Town.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed. Reaction Miracle X: Perform this Miracle immediately before an Event resolves. X is the value of the Event. If this Miracle succeeds, the Event is Aced without effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. Dudes Aced in a shootout at this location are not aced but go home booted instead. Reduce the Influence of those Dudes to 0 until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Santana Tate's Influence is reduced to 0 while he is at an in-town location. Noon: Move this Dude from one out of town location to another.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target a Dude in this loccation. Give the Dude either a +1 Influence bonus or a -1 Influence penalty until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Owner Noon: Target one of your Dudes at this location. Move the Dude to an adjacent location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target another player's discard pile. Ace all Events in that discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target another player, who must make a pull. If the pull is less than the current Fear level, raise the Fear level by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Mystical. This Dude gains a +2 bonus to all of his or her skills. This Goods is worth 1 Control Point.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play after a Dude completes a skill check. Reduce the skill(s) and Bullet rating of the target Dude to 0 until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Until after Nightfall, all Dudes in shootouts are Studs.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist. Gadget Difficulty: 8. Horse. Reaction: Boot the Crane immediately before you put an in-town Deed into play. You may place the Deed between any two adjacent in-town locations you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: If one or more Dudes were Aced last turn, raise the Fear level by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: All deeds you put into play have their GR cost reduced by 2. All your deeds enter play booted. Noon: Target an unbooted deed you own and control. Ace the Deed to gain Ghost Rock equal to the Deed's printed cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. When the Tea and Tobacco Shop enters play, get any 3 cards from your deck and/or discard pile and put them face down under the Shop. If the Shop leaves play or changes ownership, Ace the cards under the Shop. Owner Noon: If you are the controller, pay 5 Ghost Rock to take a card from under the Shop and add it to your Play hand.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Texas Rangers

property.name: Text
property.value: All your Harrowed dudes have their Ghost Rock cost and Upkeep cost reduced by 2.

property.value: The Agency

property.name: Text
property.value: You may not put Harrowed Dudes into play. When you Ace a Harrowed Dude with an action or in a shootout, the Dude does not perform a Harrowed Pull. Noon: Pay Ghost Rock equal to the difficulty of a Gadget Goods in your Play hand, and attach it to a Dude in your home. No skill check is required.

property.value: The Agency

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed:2. Noon: Target a Mystical Goods in this or an adjacent location. If the Goods is attached to a Dude with a lower value than The Crucible, discard the Goods.

property.value: Private. Strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed. Noon Miracle 8: If this Miracle succeeds, target one of your Dudes at this location. Ace this Miracle to attach one Goods from your Play hand to the Dude, ignoring all costs and requirements to enter play. Discard the Goods after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another player reveals an illegal Draw hand. That player may not play any Action cards (except Cheatin' cards) until after Nightfall. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a player per draw.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Pay 2 Ghost Rock to target a Dude. The Dude is Wanted until after Nightfall.

property.value: Huckster:0. Harrowed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: If possible, the dealer and target must be chosen to be lead shooters in this round of the shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. Out of Town. Noon: Pay 1 Ghost Rock to move one of your Dudes from one out-of-town location to another.

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-Unique. Noon: Target a Dude at this location. The Dude has a -1 Influence penalty until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. The Toy Shop gains +1 Control Point bonus when adjacent to the Candy Store.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target one or more Spells attached to another player's Dude. Discard those Spells if the Dude will have a number of Spells still attached that is equal to or greater than his or her skill level.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player may get one Terror card from their deck and/or discard pile and add it to their Play hand. Any player that does so must discard a card from their Play hand and shuffle their deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman. Noon Spirit 9: This Spirit only succeeds if the pull minus the Shaman's skill is less than the difficulty. If this Spirit succeeds, discard this Shaman. You may select one Dude in your Play hand with a lower value than the pull, and put the Dude into play at this location, ignoring all costs and requirements to enter play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Union Armory may be attached to your home. Controller Shootout: Target one of your Dudes in a shootout at this or an adjacent location. The Dude is a Stud until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. While the Union Train Depot is in play, no player can win the game unless he or she controls this Deed. The Depot's controller is always the player with the most Influence at it (owner wins ties), regardless of other card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: If Vance Donovan began this turn in the Town Square and is currently in the Town Square, gain 3 Ghost Rock.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Job: Target a Goods attached to another player's Dude. Boot one of your Dudes to start a job to steal the Goods. If the job is successful, and the Goods is either in play or in Boot Hill, attach the goods to a Dude in your posse. If the Goods ever leaves play, it is return to its owner.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Sioux Union

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman:0. Noon: Weeping Crow's value is a King until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Job: Boot one of your Dudes to start a job that targets an in-town Deed. If the job is successful, you become the owner of the Deed until it leaves play. If the Deed leaves play, ownership immediately returns to its original owner. All Dudes in your posse become Wanted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Reaction: When you reveal an illegal Draw hand. Wendigo gains a +2 Bullet bonus and a +2 Influence bonus until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attaches to Whiskey Nick without cost. Noon: Boot this dude and discard a card from your play hand to Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mystical. Horse. If this Dude is Aced, the Dude is not aced, but is discarded instead. Noon: Move this Dude to a location that contains a Harrowed Dude.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play this card when another player reveals an illegal Draw hand. Target one of that player's Dudes. The Dude's value is reduced to an Ace, permanently. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a player per draw.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. Out of Town. The controller's Abominations gain a +1 Bullet bonus.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target a Terror or Wanted Dude controlled by another player at an in-town Deed you own or control. Move that Dude to an adjacent location.
